content: संस्तु {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To praise. {@--2@} To extol, celebrate. {@--3@} To praise in chorus. {@--4@} To be acquainted with, be familiar or intimate with (chiefly in {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} in this sense); अनेकशः संस्तुतमप्यनल्पा नवं नवं प्रीतिरहो करोति <ls>Śi. 3. 31</ls>; <ls>Ki. 3. 2</ls>; see संस्तुत.
